description: Backend MCP server configuration for PowerPak system integration

slack-notifications.description: Slack integration for notifications (hire, message, booking requests)

filesystem.description: Secure filesystem access for SKILL.md files and update management

github.description: GitHub integration for PR-based skill update workflow
features: create_or_update_pull_request - Submit skill updates as PRs
create_issue - Track feature requests and updates

hireRequest.description: When someone requests to hire an expert
steps: 1. PowerPak server receives hire tool call
2. Store request details in queue (filesystem MCP)
3. Send Slack notification to expert's channel

messageRequest.description: When someone sends a message to an expert
steps: 1. PowerPak server receives message tool call
2. Send Slack message to expert's DM or channel
3. Log message in filesystem for audit trail

bookingRequest.description: When someone books a meeting with an expert
steps: 1. PowerPak server receives book_meeting tool call
2. Send Slack notification with booking details
3. Create calendar placeholder (future: integrate calendar API)

skillUpdate.description: When a skill update is detected and needs approval
steps: 1. File watcher detects new .md file in _updates folder
4. Send Slack notification for expert review
5. On PR merge, update SKILL.md and archive update file

slackChannels.skill-updates: Skill update PR notifications and approvals
